```{r}
#loading libraries
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
library(flametree)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)

tree <- flametree_grow(
  seed = 286,
  time = 12,
  angle = c(-15, 15, 30),
  split = 2,
  trees = 1
)

leaf <- tree |> filter(id_leaf == TRUE)

base <- ggplot() + 
  scale_size_identity() + 
  theme_void() + 
  coord_equal()

leaves <- geom_point(
  mapping = aes(coord_x, coord_y),
  data = leaf, 
  size = 1.3, 
  stroke = 0, 
  colour = "pink"
)

trunk <- geom_bezier(
  mapping = aes(coord_x, coord_y, group = id_pathtree, size = seg_wid),
  data = tree, 
  lineend = "round",
  show.legend = FALSE
)

# generating a random color each time
random_color <- sample(colors(), 1)




plot(base + trunk + leaves, col = random_color)



```
